section.heading: Aircraft on Lake Mahopac, Lake Moraine, Lake George, and Lake Oscawana, Owasco Lake and Greenwood Lake prohibited

content.p:
ยง 248. Aircraft on Lake Mahopac, Lake Moraine, Lake George, and Lake
Oscawana, Owasco Lake and Greenwood Lake prohibited. The taking off
from or landing upon the surface of Lake Mahopac in the town of Carmel
and county of Putnam, or upon the surface of Lake Moraine, also known as
Madison reservoir, in the town of Madison and county of Madison, except
when a landing and subsequent take off is necessary under actual
distress conditions, and the operation of aircraft on or over the waters
of Lake George, and on or over the waters of Lake Oscawana in the town
of Putnam Valley, county of Putnam, or of Owasco Lake in the county of
Cayuga or of Greenwood Lake in the town of Warwick, county of Orange for
the carriage of passengers for hire, from and to points on such lakes or
on the shores thereof, is a misdemeanor.
